fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Slaughter a player every even night, dealing a Powerful Attack to them and cleaning them

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
All of their visitors receive a Basic Attack but any survivors will learn your name.
You learn the role of any player that visits you or Bella and may deal a Basic Attack to them during the day at any time, but this can only be done once. After doing this, you will no longer learn roles.
Werewolf Fixation: You may attack every night

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take out all who disturb this terrible romance
